bibl.title: Ἰσαπόλλων / Εἰσαπόλλων: nomen delendum lexicis.
bibl.note: None of the alleged instances of Ἰσαπόλλων / Εἰσαπόλλων is fully defensible. The name, therefore, may be confidently declared a 'ghost' and excised from the onomastic lexica.
bibl.seg: BENAISSA Amin, Ἰσαπόλλων / Εἰσαπόλλων: nomen delendum lexicis.
None of the alleged instances of Ἰσαπόλλων / Εἰσαπόλλων is fully defensible. The name, therefore, may be confidently declared a 'ghost' and excised from the onomastic lexica.
